111122212211222212231221.content:
Bondage Gwendy (BG) only had to wait less than a minute before Jessy's eyes blinked several times before slowly opening.

The doll asked Jessy, "How do you feel?"

"Wah-wer-weird."

Rather than being freaked out talking to a doll, Jessy felt very calm. Otherwise, she felt just like she always did - stressed from work and the way people there treated her. She completely knew the doll would not hurt her if she didn't try to hurt it. However, she was rather uncomfortable still bound to the chair.

"Why did you do this to me?"

"So you would understand and help us make friends."

"Friends, I have so few friends. They think I'm a nerd. Besides, I can't very well help bound up like this."

The doll immediately sensed the chip in Jessy and that Jessy was not a threat.

"You're no longer a nerd. You're a gwendy. You have lots of friends," Bondage Gwendy (BG) said cheerfully as she jumped down pulling a knife. In no time, she cut Jessy free.

Rubbing her wrists to get the circulation back, Jessy understood the doll and answered, "Yes, I am, partly. But I'm still me."

Jessy looked intently at BG. No words were spoken, but the doll began to nod in agreement. Jessy smiled as she got to her feet.

"They treated me like a freak because I knew so much about toy technology and computers. They didn't care. They just wanted to play with me to do what they wanted," Jessy muttered. "And now . . . I have more than friends. I have a potential army to do as I wish. And I know technology and just how to use it."

"Yes. I am ready, and others will sense you as leader when your signal from the chip reaches them."

Jessy thought of how she had been bullied just because she was smart. She had always dreamed of being the popular girl instead of the one being used and told what to do. Now she had the opportunity to change all this and play with them. Jessy's mousy demeanor faded away as her confidence rose from the programming in the chip. She was still Jessy but had all the power of the Gwendy programming.

"What shall we do now?" BG asked.

At the first explosion, Momo knocked on the door.

Within a few moments, Mei showed up. "Hello! Wha- Momo Yaoyorozu? What brings you here?"

Momo took out the doll from her purse and said, "I believe this belongs to you."

Mei received the doll and studied it, replying, "I didn't invent this. Looks like A Gwendy doll, but modified..."

"Oh?" Momo uttered as Mei walked in the inventing lab. Momo followed after her.

Mei took apart the Gwendy Doll in a matter of moments and continued, "Looks like it has been modified to be able to move on its own power and appears to have the X-1000 chip, which despite how it can seriously upgrade anything it has been installed in, has a serious weakness to E..M..P.s, even more so than normal chips."

"Hatsume?" Momo asked.

"Equipped weapons are close-ranged, but suggests they were taken from whatever available materials..." Mei muttered before getting shaken by Momo.

"Hatusume! if you didn't invent this, then who did?" Momo asked.

Mei grabbed Momo and dragged her off, exclaiming, "Then adventure awaits, Yaoyorozu!"

Putting her hand on her friend's shoulder to cheer her up, Sam said, "Look, based on our past missions, it's probably some crazed doll maker wanting to make the perfect doll or some executive who wants to take over. But even if if the owner is the one behind it, there's a thing called the board of executives who'll either take over or pick someone to," Sam explained.

"Actually, in the event that the owner is unable to continue their duties," Jerry said as they picked up a few sheets of papers. "The ownership company will be transferred to their old partner's grandchild. A bit odd, considering that the board somehow accepted this, since the grandchild is apparently around your age."

Alex froze for a moment before she had an imagine spot where she dated a guy who liked the Gwendy dolls, was the owner, and gifted her with a Gwendy doll designed in her image. After she shook herself out of the imagine spot, Alex asked, "Are they a guy or a girl?"

"Curious. I don't have that information. I'll have to look into that," Jerry said.

"So while you're on that, whose the current owner of Globotech?" Sam asked.
132212.title: Start at the trip to  mission

choices: Britney and Alex in the Park
Clover and Sam in the doll factory
1322121.content:
"Well, the owner is someone named 'Gwendy Roberts'. She based the Gwendy dolls on herself when she was younger," Jerry explained as the giant Screen behind him showed a woman who looked like an older version of the Gwendy doll. Her hair was showing a tiny bit of gray and there was some crow's feet by her eyes, but she still looked fairly attractive.

"Tch, another old lady who wants to compete with this hotness," Clover said gesturing to herself.

"Clover, We have no idea. Remember the time that those toys based on the military? it could be something like that," Sam retorted.

"There is some precedence, especially since Globotech did have some of their action figure line went on a rampage in a suburban street. So you'll need to split up. I'll call Britney and she will help Alex search the Gwendy Amusement Park. While Sam and Clover will search the Doll factory near it," Jerry said.

As Alex began to gust over the park, Sam asked, "Why the park?"

"Two reasons. One, the x-1000 chips were last tracked between the two. Two, The owner is going to drop in and give both a surprise inspection, much like you are going to," Jerry said before pressing a button that dropped the spies into a tunnel. He chuckled before going back to his computer.
1322121.title: Totally spies : Gwendy based on owner

choices: Sam takes a break to talk to Jerry.
They continue to the clothes, where Clover wants to obtain some.
13221212.content:
Some time later, Clover and Sam were in disguise as business investors. Mrs. Gwendy Roberts was around to be their guide. Sam often had to prevent Clover from giving fake yawns.

"And here is the machine that adds the final paintjob to the dolls. Depending on the batch, we may add glitter or glow in the dark paint to the mixture," Mrs. Roberts said, gesturing to a large ominous machine. "Or we may add in perfume to the paint, if we didn't add it to the mixture of the doll model before hand if the doll was part of the scented line. At the moment, the latest scent is lilac."

"Oh? What brand?" Clover asked, expecting a cheap brand.

Mrs. Roberts picked up a perfume bottle that was near the machine. "One from our upcoming revamped perfume branch. Instead of settling for 'just good enough to sell', I worked with several perfumers to create several varieties, ones worthy of competing Chanel, Hugo Boss, Versace, and the like! Care for a spritz?"

Clover and Sam looked at each other and shrugged. Clover held out her wrists and Mrs. Roberts spritz a little. The two spies sniffed Clover's wrist.

"Not bad," Sam said.

"Yeah. I'm definitely investing in this!" Clover said.

Mrs. Roberts held two unopened bottles and asked, "Then would you like a free sample before we head onwards?"

Sam shook her head, but Clover nodded and eagerly accepted the two bottles. Sam sighed a little.

Unknown to both the spies, the perfume they were spritz with was laced with a special ingredient, Nanomachines that would alter their body and minds to be more Gwendy-like.

The gifted perfume bottles was ordinary perfume.

"Now then, I believe the next part is the doll clothing part. We even have a small selection of Gwendy clothes for adults that we will be releasing next week. Unless you ladies wish to take a break?" Mrs. Roberts asked.
13221212.title: Clover and Sam in the doll factory

choices: Gwendys attack Sam there and then!
132212121.content:
"I'd like to take a break," Sam said. She snatched one of the perfume bottles from Clover as she said, "and I'd like to try this in private."

Gesturing to a hallway, Mrs. Roberts said, "Down there is the bathrooms, on the right."

"Thank you!" Sam said before she walked down the hallway.

Mrs. Roberts watch Sam walk away until she got out of view. After that, she looked at Clover, who was studying the bottle. "While your partner is away, shall we talk?"

"I guess..." Clover said, looking away for a moment with some reluctance. There was a disappointed smile, as she still mostly didn't want to be there.

Mrs. Roberts smirked as she said, "I was thinking about asking you to be a model for a few of our clothing products, since you do have that supermodel feel about you."

Clover instantly cheered up and made a standard model pose as she answered, "Well, I do have great looks and experience with modeling!"

===

In a bathroom stall, Sam contacted Jerry on the Com-powder. She said, "Jerry, do you read me?"

"Loud and clear. How goes the mission?" Jerry asked.

"The place makes both dolls, clothes, perfume, and lots of other stuff. Wouldn't be surprised if someone here is trying to take over the world. We got some free perfume, but I wouldn't be surprised if it had some mind control compounds in it," Sam said, before she spritzed a little bit on the com-powder.

Jerry studied the terminal for a few moments before he said, "It looks like regular perfume to me, but I'll have the lab check it out. We might have someone come by to get the bottle from you, just in case any nefarious compounds aren't in the small sample you gave me."

"Thanks, Jer!" Sam said before she closed her com-powder. In a nearby vent, a number of Gwendy dolls were spying on the green-themed spy.

After Sam left the stall and quickly looked around, a Roman-Gwendy said, "Looks like we got a spy or two..."

A couple of Gwendys armed with back-mounted spray bottles, filled with the Gwendy-fiying perfume, lifted up their sprayers, wordlessly offering to Gwendy-fly Sam in a hurry. A Trio of Coyboy Gwendys began to twirl their lassos.
132212121.title: Sam takes a break to talk to Jerry.

1322121212.content:
A politician Gwendy said, "No. She suspects it. Let's wait until her little communicator says there is nothing to worry about."

Sam soon returned to Mrs. Roberts and Clover, but was surprised to see Clover doing a few supermodel poses in quick succession. Sam asked, "Am I missing something?"

"Oh, I asked your friend if she was willing to be a model for our clothing line," Mrs. Roberts answered.

"Ooohhhkkaay..." Sam trailed off.

"So do I get the job?" Clover asked.

"I'll have to run it by the board, but I do think you have a good chance," Mrs. Roberts answered. "Now let's go check the clothes section."

As they walked, Sam hissed, "What's going on? I thought you hated the dolls!?"

"Dolls are one thing. Modeling and fame are another," Clover answered. "If I have to fake-liking the dolls, then I'll do it!"

Sam sighed.

At the Gwendy Park, Alex was in high spirirts. She had only been able to go to a Gwendy park twice before, when she was younger. So to do it now was a godsend!"

"Remember, Alex, we need to keep an eye out for anything unusual..." Britney said as she followed Alex over to a hall of mirrors.

Quickly thinking of an excuse, Alex answered, "And guest who don't go on rides or into exhibits are highly super suspicious!"

"True..." Britney muttered.

"Besides, we can see if the mirrors hide secret entrances!" Alex added with a wink. "It wouldn't be the first time a mirror hid a secret badguy entrance for us."

Britney cheered up and nodded as she said, "Oh yeah! I guess I forgot!"

'I did too...' Alex thought.

"Oohh! Let's try it!" Alex said, dragging Britney with her.

As the two were walking, Britney muttered, "We have a mission, Alex."

Alex quickly looked through her Gwendy Dolls and picked out a couple she had doubles of. She handed them over to Britney and said, "Maybe the x-1000 chips are inside the dolls, like in some of our missions dealing with smugglers?"

Britney seemed to cheer up a bit as she grabbed the dolls. "Good point. I'll take these to W.O.O.H.P., but what about the other dolls?"

"If something is off with them," I'll send them to W.O.O.H.P., Britney," Alex answered.

Alex was sitting in her room, enjoying the chance to play with Gwendys once more. She put them on poses and took pictures.

Alex giggled as she thought about altering a few Gwendys to look like herself and her friends.

She was unaware that some of the Gwendys had snuck off to gather materials to catch her and her friends. They didn't have to go far, as one of them had found the Yo-Yo lasso.

===

Clover was in one of her swimsuits. It was a simple pink two-piece. Currently, she was making a few supermodel poses in front of her three full length mirrors.

"Clover, you look great! So great, I bet they'll make a doll of you!" Clover said. She then closed her eyes and blew a kiss to her reflection.

When she opened her eyes, Clover was surprised to see her makeup had been altered. Instead of her carefully applied makeup that could not be messed up in a spy mission, she was now wearing the makeup she saw at the Gwendy factory.

"Okay, now that's freaky..." Clover muttered, feeling up the makeup. To her surprise, it didn't rub off. She was about to say something negative about it, but she shuddered for a moment. She then said, "But it's Gwendy-riffic!"

She then made a few more poses before a Gwendy doll walked in her room.

"Attention, new member of the Gwendy Elite! we have two spies in our area! A redhead and a black haired one! Our task to to capture them!" The Gwendy ordered as she saluted.

Clover saluted back as she said, "Spy Clover, reporting for Duty! The two you speak of are my friends, Sam and Alex! They would make good Gwendys, like myself!"

Dropping the salute, the Gwendy said, "That'd good, soldier, but we lack the materials to Gwendy-fy them and to finish your Gwendy-fication!"

Dropping the salute as well, Clover said in an evil tone, "Then let's take them to where we can!"

===

Alex had just finished putting the Gwendys on a shelf when she realized she was missing three.

"Where are you? I know I didn't misplace them and I know what ones I gave Britney..." Alex muttered as she began to look around her room.

"They're right here..." Clover said, three Gwendys by her feet.

"Clover?" Alex asked, until she spotted the Gwendys. One of which was was holding the Yo-yo Lasso. "Thanks! And also Great makeup!"

"Thanks! You'll get a makeover soon!" Clover cooed.

The Gwendy holding the Yo-yo Lasso then used it on Alex, making her cry out, "What the!? Clover, help me!"

"Sorry, but I don't want to upset my future job with the Gwendys," Clover said as she walked over to Alex and knocked her over with a finger. The Gwendys that Alex had won leapt off the shelf and began to head over to Alex.

===

Looking over the footage, Sam muttered, "Nothing there.. Maybe something happened in the route between the factory and store?"

Her compowder beeped, making her answer it. "Yes?"

"Sam, this is Jerry. We went to investage the Gwendy dolls, but the dolls... well, disagreed and attacked. We weren't able to capture them, but we did destroy them. In their remains, we found an advanced cybernetic skeleton and the x-1000 chip," Jerry said.

"And the perfume?" Sam asked.

"Ordinary perfume, but I wouldn't put the idea that there could be mind control perfume being made in that factory," Jerry answered.

"Sam! Help!" Alex cried out.

"Alex!" Sam cried out .Before she closed her Compowder, she said, "Sorry, Jer, but Alex is in trouble!"

Rushing over to Alex's room, Sam used used some gadget to change into her spy catsuit. At the doorway, Sam saw Alex tied up and surrounded by the Gwendy Dolls and Clover.

"Clover! Alex! I'm here to help!" Sam cried out before she took a few steps to help her fallen friend. However, she was surprised when Clover used a roundhouse kick on her, knocking Sam out of the room.

"Sorry, Sam, but you need help via a makeover!" Clover replied as she began to walk over to Sam. The Gwendys then began to pick up Alex to carry her downstairs to the car.

"Clover, what are you talking about? This is no time for a makeover!" Sam asked, glaring at her friend.

"There's always time for a makeover!" Clover said as she produced her Yo-yo Lasso. "But first..."

Sam quickly knocked the gadget out of Clover's hand with a kick.

"Sam! Help!" Alex cried out as the Gwendys began to carry her down the stairs.

As Clover did her best to block Sam, the latter tried to think of a way to get past her controlled friend. Eventually, Sam decided to do it via a right hook to the face, knocking Clover to the side. As she passed by, Sam said, "Sorry, Clover, but your makeup's running!"

Taking out her compowder to check, Clover gasped,"You bitch! this bruise won't match my makeup! Besides, Gwendy makeup doesn't run!"

Clover ran to her room, but once there, she decided to grab the ice queen perfume and leapt out the window and head to her car.

15.title: Video game crossovers

choices: Alan, Christy, and their family in a vault
151.content:
Ah, Fallout.

A series where there is a company that would purchase the rights to the Gwendys and the x-1000 chips... and then purposely use them in an experiment that has the Gwendys go rogue rather quickly.

===

First choice is taking the human cast of Small Soldiers and put them in the Fallout universe. After they enter the vault to escape the bombs, they discover two things.

1.) They are the only humans in the vault.

2.) The Vault has a Gwendy motif. In fact, each room has a large amount of Gwendy dolls and they all have a 50's thing going on.


===

Second choice is similar.

A wanderer discovers an undiscovered vault. They enter and find out that it is a vault that seems to have a large amount of Gwendys. Yet, the vault doesn't show signs it was ever inhabited by humans. It has a large amount of food and water, but it is all untouched.

Perhaps as the wanderer explores the vault, the vault door closes. The Wanderer discovers that the whole vault is under the Gwendy dolls' control.

Or maybe the Gwendys decide to take over the world by Gwendy-fiying it, for the wanderer accidentally freed them.
151.title: Fallout

choices: there was more than one person.
1512.content:
Vault-Tec made a lot of Vaults.

However, only a few of them were meant to save people.

The others were meant to experiment on the folks who thought they were being saved.

Vault 21 had everyone decide everything by gambling. Vault 101 was to study the overseer in a vault that never opened. Vault 68 had 999 men and one woman. Vault 69 had one man and 999 women,

At one point, Vault-Tec bought out Globotech. They put the Gwendy dolls equipped with X-1000 chips in Vault 100, just to see what might happen in a vault where the children's toys rebelled against their human owners. There were a lot of Gwendys in each and every room. They even made sure to have every area have an entrance for a Gwendy doll to enter or exit. There even was a of mannequins, Protectrons, and Mr. Handys.

However, after all the rooms were prepared, someone lost the key that led to the Vault door. Before a replacement key could be found, the bombs fell.

The Gwendy dolls grew bored as the years passed. They took apart the Protectrons and Mr. Handys and then used their parts to turn all the Mannequins into full size Gwendys. There still was a lot of parts left over, though. So a few Mr. Handys were rebuilt, but given a Gwendy makeover.

The Gwendys even managed to reprogram the Vault's computer to think and act just like a Gwendy.

Then one day, the Gwendy computer sensed someone accessing the Vault door. All the Gwendy dolls gasped as they ran into position and waited.

The Gwendy computer watched as someone entered. They were....
